statements: SELECT * FROM policy_renewals_and_cancellations;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, policy_start_date FROM policy_renewals_and_cancellations ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, policy_end_date, renewal_type FROM policy_renewals_and_cancellations WHERE renewal_type = 'manual';
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policy_renewals_and_cancellations WHERE policy_holder_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, cancellation_reason FROM policy_renewals_and_cancellations WHERE cancellation_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_renewals_and_cancellations WHERE policy_id = 1001
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policy_renewals_and_cancellations WHERE renewal_type = 'automatic'
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_end_date, cancellation_reason FROM policy_renewals_and_cancellations WHERE cancellation_reason IS NOT NULL
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date FROM policy_renewals_and_cancellations WHERE policy_start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM policy_renewals_and_cancellations WHERE policy_id BETWEEN 2000 AND 3000
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, renewal_date, premium_amount FROM policy_renewals;
SELECT * FROM policy_renewals WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_holder_name, renewal_date, premium_amount FROM policy_renewals ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_renewals LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT policy_id, renewal_date, premium_amount FROM policy_renewals WHERE renewal_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM policy_renewals WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01' AND premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY renewal_date DESC
SELECT policy_holder_name, renewal_date, premium_amount FROM policy_renewals WHERE premium_amount > 5000 AND policy_holder_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY premium_amount DESC
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, renewal_date, premium_amount FROM policy_renewals WHERE policy_holder_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') ORDER BY renewal_date ASC, premium_amount DESC

SELECT pc.cancellation_id, pr.policy_holder_name, pc.cancellation_date, pc.cancellation_reason FROM policy_cancellations pc INNER JOIN policy_renewals pr ON pc.policy_id = pr.policy_id WHERE pc.cancellation_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY pc.cancellation_date DESC

SELECT pr.policy_id, COUNT(pc.cancellation_id) AS cancellation_count FROM policy_renewals pr LEFT JOIN policy_cancellations pc ON pr.policy_id = pc.policy_id GROUP BY pr.policy_id HAVING cancellation_count > 1 ORDER BY cancellation_count DESC, pr.policy_id
SELECT * FROM policy_renewals;
SELECT id, renewal_date, policy_number FROM policy_renewals ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT policy_number, premium FROM policy_renewals WHERE premium > 1000;
SELECT name, email FROM policyholders WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_cancellations WHERE reason LIKE '%customer%' ORDER BY cancellation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_renewals WHERE renewal_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT id, policy_number FROM policy_cancellations WHERE cancellation_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT name, email FROM policyholders WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT policy_number, cancellation_date, reason FROM policy_cancellations WHERE reason LIKE '%billing%' ORDER BY cancellation_date ASC
SELECT id, policy_number, premium FROM policy_renewals WHERE premium > 500 ORDER BY premium DESC
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policies WHERE policyholder_id = 2;
SELECT renewal_date, renewal_amount FROM renewals WHERE policy_id = 3 ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, cancellation_date, reason FROM cancellations WHERE cancellation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT ph.name, c.reason FROM policyholders ph JOIN cancellations c ON ph.policyholder_id = c.policy_id;
SELECT p.policy_id, ph.name, r.renewal_date, r.renewal_amount FROM policies p JOIN policyholders ph ON p.policyholder_id = ph.policyholder_id JOIN renewals r ON p.policy_id = r.policy_id;
SELECT ph.name, p.policy_type FROM policyholders ph JOIN policies p ON ph.policyholder_id = p.policyholder_id WHERE p.policy_type = 'Car Insurance';
SELECT * FROM policy_holders;
SELECT name, policy_number, renewal_date FROM policy_holders WHERE renewal_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount, coverage_type FROM policy_details ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_number, start_date, end_date FROM policy_details WHERE coverage_type = 'Health';
SELECT id, policy_number, reason FROM cancellations WHERE cancellation_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-08-31';
SELECT id, name, policy_number, renewal_date FROM policy_holders;
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount, coverage_type, start_date, end_date FROM policy_details ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM renewals WHERE renewal_amount > 500;
SELECT policy_number, cancellation_date, reason FROM cancellations WHERE reason LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT policy_number, report_date, report_type, policy_holder_name, status FROM reports WHERE status='active';
